content:
I want to change the name of a directory that corresponds to a git worktree branch, but simply changing the name results in problems with /library/backtrace:

git status
fatal: cannot chdir to '../../../../../../../constant-vals/library/backtrace': No such file or directory
fatal: 'git status --porcelain=2' failed in submodule library/backtrace

where constant-vals is the previous name of the directory. Does anybody know whether its possible to do this and if so how?
Doesn't work for me unfortunately: fatal: working trees containing submodules cannot be moved or removed
